name: '90s Football Stars
description: Fast and dynamic arcade football game! With crazy, retro-styled approach ’90s Football Stars recalls the glory days of the genre, bringing back memories of cult classics like Sensible World of Soccer and International Superstar Soccer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 2.4GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB VRAM, DirectX® 9.0c Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c Compatible Additional Notes: DDR3
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 3.1GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, DirectX® 9.0c Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c Compatible Additional Notes: DDR4
